Package com.flipfit.bean

Class Slot

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.bean.Slot
public class Slot extends Object
The Class Slot. Represents a time slot in a gym center of the FlipFit system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Slot()
    Instantiates a new slot with default values.
    Slot(int slotId, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime, int totalSeats, int availableSeats, int centerId)
    Instantiates a new slot with specified details.
